While its a minor quibble, you should know there's no "agreeing" 
or "disag=
reeing" about Nobunaga being a Shogun. He wasn't. Only the 
Tokugawa and th=
e Ashikaga families had Shoguns during the Sengoku 
Jidai, and, even had No=
bunaga indeed conquered all of Japan, he 
probably never would have been on=
e either (probably a kempaku like 
Hideyoshi).
